channel.title: Projects on Computational Genomics of the Human Brain
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Computational Genomics of the Human Brain

item.title: dream
item.description: dream: Powerful differential expression analysis for repeated measures designs

item.title: CommonMind Consortium provides transcriptomic and epigenomic data for Schizophrenia and Bipolar Disorder
item.description: Public resource of functional genomic data from the dorsolateral prefrontal cortex (DLPFC; Brodmann areas 9 and 46): RNA-seq and SNP genotypes on 980 individuals, and ATAC-seq on 269 individuals from 4 separate brain banks.

item.title: DeepFIGV
item.description: Functional Interpretation of Genetic Variants Using Deep Learning Predicts Impact on Epigenome.

item.title: variancePartition
item.description: Interpreting drivers of variation in complex gene expression studies with linear mixed models

item.title: Data and code resources for an hiPSC model
item.description: RNA-seq data from hiPSC-derived neural progenitor cells and neurons from controls and patients with childhood onset schizophrenia

item.title: Design hiPSC experiments
item.description: Design powerful transcriptome experiments given cost constraints

item.title: Referance map of human brain epigenome
item.description: Data from ChIP-seq for H3K4me3 (promoters) and H3K27ac (enhancers and promoters) from 2 brain regions from 17 individuals

item.title: lrgpr
item.description: Interactive linear mixed model analysis of genome-wide association studies with composite hypothesis testing and regression diagnostics in R
